comment: Dr.Dyal was one of the sweetest Professors I've had at the school and I'm a Sr. Not a tough grader at all, she responds to you fast if you message her the ONLY con to her is she does grade slow lol but it's worth it. there were 6 Quizes (open book) and 1paper due the 7th week (8pages) so very light workload if your taking multiple classes 10/10

She's a very sweet lady, the class is nice however she did take a minute to grade, she grades in bulk before midterm grades which was confusing but she isn't a hard grader. a lot of fill in the blank/ true false type questions in the quizzes and tests and we have some discussions due but overall shes not terrible, definitely worse professors at ksu

i took PHE 4300 but she grades very slow. Her quizzes are always blank and buggy and we have to  email her to fix them. The class was easy but her being unorganized was very irritating. Shes nice but it seems like teaching and grading aren't priorities to her. I would take again bc it was easy but she was all over the place

is very nice, but does not grade quickly, quizzes are a bit difficult because you can not find the answers in the notes and PowerPoint given, which needs to be put together a bit better. I would have this teacher again if somethings get fixed.
Awesome instructor. Responds very fast and truly reads your class discussions. From day one she engages with every student. Would gladly take any course she's instructing. Also very funny !!

Really sweet teacher who's passionate about the material. Lectures are funny and all the assignments are based on each student's interested so they're not bad to complete. She is really bad at keeping up with grading - most grades were not entered until after the finals in December, so that's a downside.
